description:
Ishikawa learns more about her classmate, Misa Kusunoki. The students in 2-A celebrate Ishikawa`s birthday.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Kyuuketsuki-chan to Kusunoki-san / Kyuuketsuki-chan no Tanjoubi
Li`l Miss Vampire and Kusunoki-san / Li`l Miss Vampire`s Birthday
吸血鬼ちゃんと楠木さん / 吸血鬼ちゃんの誕生日
